text: Adolfo Bolea Sanz (24 March 1933 – 14 November 2020) was a Spanish football forward and manager. He spent most of his career playing and managing with Cádiz. He played 309 games and scored 115 goals in Segunda División. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spanish football managers
title: Adolfo Bolea
